name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF ENVIRONMENTAL PROTECTION, v. ALTOONA CITY AUTHORITY, City of Altoona, and American Premier Underwriters, Inc., v. CONSOLIDATED RAIL CORP., Pennsylvania Electric Co., Redevelopment Authority of Altoona, Union Tank Car Co., and Simon Resources, Inc.,

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF ENVIRONMENTAL PROTECTION, v. ALTOONA CITY AUTHORITY, City of Altoona, and American Premier Underwriters, Inc., v. CONSOLIDATED RAIL CORP., Pennsylvania Electric Co., Redevelopment Authority of Altoona, Union Tank Car Co., and Simon Resources, Inc.,

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 29th day of May, 1997, the direct appeal is quashed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
693 A.2d 583
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF ENVIRONMENTAL PROTECTION, v. ALTOONA CITY AUTHORITY, City of Altoona, and American Premier Underwriters, Inc., v. CONSOLIDATED RAIL CORP., Pennsylvania Electric Co., Redevelopment Authority of Altoona, Union Tank Car Co., and Simon Resources, Inc.,
No. 29 Middle District Appeal Docket 1997.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
May 29, 1997.
